alert.note: Alert for De Witt; Logan; Mason; McLean; Menard; Tazewell; Woodford (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 02 at 8:36AM CDT until August 02 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 AM CDT FOR MENARD...LOGAN...SOUTHEASTERN WOODFORD...DE WITT...SOUTHEASTERN TAZEWELL...MCLEAN AND SOUTHEASTERN MASON COUNTIES... At 836 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Waynesville, or 13 miles northwest of Clinton, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bloomington, Lincoln, Clinton, Eureka, Normal, Le Roy, Heyworth, El Paso, Petersburg, Lexington, Farmer City, Athens, Hudson, Chenoa, Atlanta, Mount Pulaski, Minier, Danvers, Colfax and Downs. This includes the following highways... Interstate 155 between mile markers 0 and 5. Interstate 39 between mile markers 0 and 14. Interstate 55 between mile markers 112 and 186. Interstate 74 between mile markers 110 and 157. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Lincoln.

area.areaDesc: De Witt; Logan; Mason; McLean; Menard; Tazewell; Woodford
